column5: Close to Arlington Entertainment District...Cowboys & Rangers Stadiums, Six Flags and Lone Star Park. With a 24 minute drive to Fort Worth and Dallas. 15 mins drive from the DFW Airport & the Train Station. 7 minutes away from Megabus!  I have been told the pictures don't do justice IRL.  UPDATE: I am preggo & due in August, please keep that in mind if you don't like babies. Thank you!
